according to the latest BIOS BLS data

okay wait let's go back up here for a

we're supposed to have anywhere between

the unemployment rate is at 4.1 percent

because if we take a quick look at the

so home prices grow at a higher pace so
basically how are these people affording

so we had a negative 0.6% it was revised

they're not saving because we know the
savings rate is continually declining
home ownership is at the lowest that
we've ever seen it but they're telling

is wrong here
somebody is lying someone is

none of these corporations are in
